TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GridViewCommandEventHandler(object sender, GridViewCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GridViewCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub GridViewCommandEventHandler(sender As Object, e As GridViewCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void GridViewCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, GridViewCommandEventArgs ^ e);
type GridViewCommandEventHandler = delegate of obj * GridViewCommandEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件中的按钮时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a button within the control is clicked. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 当单击某些按钮时， 控件还会引发其他专用事件（例如，将 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Delete"、"Update" 和 "Page" 的按钮）。The control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", and "Page" for example). 使用其中一个按钮时，应考虑处理控件提供的专用事件之一（如 或 ）。When using one of these buttons, you should consider handling one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as or ). 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式将 委托添加到 控件的 事件。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewCommandEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewCommandEventHandler/CS/gridviewcommandeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewCommandEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewCommandEventHandler/VB/gridviewcommandeventhandlervb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式将 委托添加到 控件的 事件。The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCommmand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/CS/gridviewrowcommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCommmand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/VB/gridviewrowcommandvb.aspx#1)]
